pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Saturday, March 18, 2023 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

York Region, Ontario

Private meetings

3:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with members of the Persian community.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

3:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend a Nowruz celebration with members of the Persian community.

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 2:45 p.m.
  • Media interested in participating can contact media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca for details.
